comment.author: 25537552@N03
comment._content: Título: Masa de espectadores observando una marcha sufragista en la Avenida Penn

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: I wonder if this picture could have been taken at the very beginning or end of the parade.  The street cars are running, and there seems to be a concentration of action at the front of the frame, where men are talking with women and there seem to be several police. . . . people in the crowd are facing in many different directions, which is confusing.   Perhaps the man is dispensing sashes for marchers to wear?
